item.title: CFP closes in two weeks! Hurry Up!
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Remember that the CFP will end on Jan 31st, so hurry up and don’t miss the chance to be part of phpDay 2016! Please remember that the phpDay is an international conference, so session proposals must be in English. Tickets are available, get one at the discounted early bird price until they last! Do […]
item.content:encoded:
Remember that the CFP will end on Jan 31st, so hurry up and don’t miss the chance to be part of phpDay 2016! Please remember that the phpDay is an international conference, so session proposals must be in English.

Tickets are available, get one at the discounted early bird price until they last!

Do you want to be part of phpDay 2016 as a sponsor? Take a look to our sponsorship options!

item.title: Aaaaand we’re back! Again!
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: The phpDay 2016 organization is officially started! The conference will take place in Verona (same hotel of the previous years) from 13th to 14th May 2016. The Call for Papers and Call for Sponsors are open. Meanwhile you can contact us on twitter or take a look at our Vimeo Channels with the videos of the past edition.
item.content:encoded: The phpDay 2016 organization is officially started! The conference will take place in Verona (same hotel of the previous years) from 13th to 14th May 2016. The Call for Papers and Call for Sponsors are open. Meanwhile you can contact us on twitter or take a look at our Vimeo Channels with the videos of the past edition.
